Title: Marvel's Iron Fist
Synopsis: Danny Rand resurfaces 15 years after being presumed dead. Now, with the power of the Iron Fist, he seeks to reclaim his past and fulfill his destiny.

Title: The Protector
Synopsis: Discovering his ties to a secret ancient order, a young man living in modern Istanbul embarks on a quest to save the city from an immortal enemy.

Title: Marvel's Daredevil
Synopsis: Blinded as a young boy, Matt Murdock fights injustice by day as a lawyer and by night as the Super Hero Daredevil in Hell's Kitchen, New York City.

Title: The Umbrella Academy
Synopsis: Reunited by their father's death, estranged siblings with extraordinary powers uncover shocking family secrets -- and a looming threat to humanity.

Title: Marvel's Jessica Jones
Synopsis: Haunted by a traumatic past, Jessica Jones uses her gifts as a private eye to find her tormentor before he can harm anyone else in Hell's Kitchen.

Title: Marvel's Luke Cage
Synopsis: A hoodie-wearing, unbreakable ex-con fights to clear his name and save his neighborhood. He wasn't looking for a fight, but the people need a hero.

Title: Marvel's The Defenders
Synopsis: Daredevil, Jessica Jones, Luke Cage and Iron Fist join forces to take on common enemies as a sinister conspiracy threatens New York City.

Title: Ultraman
Synopsis: Decades ago, a hero from the stars left this world in peace. Now, the son of Ultraman must rise to protect the Earth from a new alien threat.

Title: The Neighbor
Synopsis: Self-centered Javier's life gets a bit messy when he unexpectedly becomes a superhero -- and his recent ex is tasked with uncovering his identity.

Title: Cyborg 009: Call of Justice
Synopsis: Years after taking up normal lives incognito, the cyborgs are forced to fight again when the superhuman Blessed appear with a plan for humanity.

Title: Super Drags
Synopsis: In this adult animated series, three gay co-workers lead double lives as drag queen superheroes, saving the LGBTQ community from evil nemeses.

Title: KENGAN ASHURA
Synopsis: Ohma Tokita enters a hidden world where corporate disputes are settled in brutal gladiator bouts. Forget the money, he just wants to fight -- and win.

Title: BAKI
Synopsis: While martial arts champion Baki Hanma trains hard to surpass his legendary father, five violent death row inmates descend upon Tokyo to take him on.

Title: ​SAINT SEIYA: Knights of the Zodiac
Synopsis: Seiya and the Knights of the Zodiac rise again to protect the reincarnation of the goddess Athena, but a dark prophecy hangs over them all.

Title: Castlevania
Synopsis: A vampire hunter fights to save a besieged city from an army of otherworldly beasts controlled by Dracula himself. Inspired by the classic video games.

Title: Kakegurui
Synopsis: High roller Yumeko Jabami plans to clean house at Hyakkaou Private Academy, a school where students are evaluated solely on their gambling skills.

Title: Magi: Adventure of Sinbad
Synopsis: The Magi who became High King of the Seven Seas started as a boy determined to make the world a better place. He begins with a dangerous dungeon.

Title: Violet Evergarden
Synopsis: The war is over, and Violet Evergarden needs a job. Scarred and emotionless, she takes a job as a letter writer to understand herself and her past.

Title: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K.: Reawakened
Synopsis: Kusuo and his gaggle of self-proclaimed friends are back for more psychic mishaps. If he didn't have enough problems before, he's got even more now.

Title: Teasing Master Takagi-san
Synopsis: Teased constantly by classmate Takagi-san, middle-schooler Nishikata swears payback by trying (and failing) to give her a dose of her own medicine.

Title: SWORDGAI The Animation
Synopsis: A young man becomes host to a legendary infernal sword and, with the fate of humanity now in his arm, wields its demonic power against his enemies.

Title: Devilman Crybaby
Synopsis: With demons reawakened and humanity in turmoil, a sensitive demon-boy is led into a brutal, degenerate war against evil by his mysterious friend, Ryo.

Title: Ultraman
Synopsis: Decades ago, a hero from the stars left this world in peace. Now, the son of Ultraman must rise to protect the Earth from a new alien threat.

Title: B: The Beginning
Synopsis: Genius investigator Keith Flick rejoins the royal police force just as serial killer "B" emerges. Mysterious youth Koku may be an ally, or a target.

Title: Fate/Apocrypha
Synopsis: The theft of the Greater Grail from Fuyuki City leads to a splintered timeline in which the Great Holy Grail War is waged on an unprecedented scale.

Title: 7SEEDS
Synopsis: Shy Natsu awakens as part of a group chosen to ensure the survival of humanity. Together, they have to survive on a changed Earth.

Title: Ultramarine Magmell
Synopsis: Decades after the sudden birth of a new continent, a young rescuer-for-hire provides aid to adventurers exploring this dangerous, uncharted world.

Title: Little Witch Academia
Synopsis: Akko enrolls at the Luna Nova Witchcraft Academy. She's not the best student, but her bright attitude is the key to her and her friends' success.

Title: CAROLE & TUESDAY
Synopsis: Part-timer Carole meets rich girl Tuesday, and each realizes they've found the musical partner they need. Together, they just might make it.

Title: Hi Score Girl
Synopsis: A chronic gamer abysmally inept in academics and sports finally meets his match at his usual shady arcade -- and it’s his rich classmate, Akira.

Title: AJIN: Demi-Human
Synopsis: A teenager discovers that he is an Ajin and flees before the authorities experiment on him. Other Ajin plan to fight back and he must choose a side.

Title: Sirius the Jaeger
Synopsis: In imperial Tokyo, a group calling themselves "Jaegers" secretly hunt the vampires seeking the Ark of Sirius. Among them is young werewolf, Yuliy.

Title: Forest of Piano
Synopsis: Kai grows up playing an old piano discarded in the woods; Shuhei's father is a famous pianist. Their chance meeting transforms their lives and music.

Title: Seis Manos
Synopsis: Orphans raised by a martial arts master are plunged into a mystery involving demonic powers, drug cartels, ancient rituals and blood sacrifice.

Title: Back Street Girls -GOKUDOLS-
Synopsis: To pay for an epic blunder, three yakuza brothers are forced to alter their bodies, form a girl group and break into the underground J-Pop idol scene.

Title: Levius
Synopsis: Young Levius rises through the ranks in the brutal world of metal boxing under his uncle's guidance. Forces outside the ring have their eye on him.

Title: Aggretsuko
Synopsis: Frustrated with her thankless office job, Retsuko the Red Panda copes with her daily struggles by belting out death metal karaoke after work.

Title: Kabaneri of the Iron Fortress: The Battle of Unato
Synopsis: Ikoma and the Iron Fortress take their fight to the battlegrounds of Unato, joining the alliance to reclaim the region from the kabane horde.

Title: Rilakkuma and Kaoru
Synopsis: Her life might be a little mundane, but Kaoru gets to go home to Rilakkuma, her endearingly lazy roommate who happens to be a fuzzy toy bear.

Title: Children of the Whales
Synopsis: As a magic wielder, young archivist Chakuro knows his time is short, but everything changes when a girl from the outside appears on his island.

Title: LOST SONG
Synopsis: War looms over the kingdom of Neunatia, where two young women are both burdened and blessed by the power of song.

Title: Cannon Busters
Synopsis: Immortal renegade Philly the Kid and his transforming pink Cadillac join a relentlessly upbeat friendship droid on her quest to find a missing prince.

Title: A.I.C.O.
Synopsis: Everything Aiko knew was a lie. Now she's joining a team of Divers to reach the place where the Burst began to stop it for good and save her family.

Title: LAST HOPE
Synopsis: After causing the near extinction of mankind seven years ago, genius scientist Leon Lau must now fight the ecological disaster he unwittingly created.

Title: HERO MASK
Synopsis: After a rash of mysterious deaths, Crown prosecutor Sarah Sinclair and SSC agent James Blood discover a conspiracy surrounding uncanny new bio-masks.

Title: Fate/EXTRA Last Encore
Synopsis: Hakuno Kishinami finds himself in the midst of a Holy Grail war with no memories of how he got there. Through his confusion, he must fight to survive.

Title: revisions
Synopsis: When Shibuya time-warps to 2388, high schooler Daisuke and his friends are conscripted by AHRV agent Milo to fight the hostile cyborg race, revisions.

Title: Kuromukuro
Synopsis: When mecha attack a research center, its students, pilots, and researchers must fight back with the help of mysterious artifacts and a young samurai.

Title: Ingress: The Animation
Synopsis: After scientists discover a mysterious substance that can influence human minds, two factions wage an all-out battle to control its awesome power.

Title: Cyborg 009: Call of Justice
Synopsis: Years after taking up normal lives incognito, the cyborgs are forced to fight again when the superhuman Blessed appear with a plan for humanity.

Title: DRAGON PILOT: Hisone & Masotan
Synopsis: Recently stationed Air Self-Defense Force rookie Hisone Amakasu is chosen by a dragon concealed within Gifu Air Base to be his pilot.

Title: ID-0
Synopsis: In the midst of a field exercise operating I-Machines, Alliance Academy student Maya Mikuri is thrown into an entirely different kind of adventure.

Title: Aggretsuko: We Wish You a Metal Christmas
Synopsis: While Retsuko desperately makes plans for Christmas Eve, her new obsession with seeking validation through social media spirals out of control.

Title: Cagaster of an Insect Cage
Synopsis: Thirty years after a disease that turns the infected into carnivorous insects emerged, a young exterminator and a teenage girl search for her mother.

Title: The End of the F***ing World
Synopsis: A budding teen psychopath and a rebel hungry for adventure embark on a star-crossed road trip in this darkly comic series based on a graphic novel.

Title: Shadowhunters: The Mortal Instruments
Synopsis: The life of typical teen Clary Fray is upended when she learns that she's part of a race of demon-hunting humans who have the blood of angels.

Title: Elite
Synopsis: When three working-class teens enroll in an exclusive private school in Spain, the clash between them and the wealthy students leads to murder.

Title: Anne with an E
Synopsis: A plucky orphan whose passions run deep finds an unlikely home with a spinster and her soft-spoken bachelor brother. Based on "Anne of Green Gables."

Title: Selection Day
Synopsis: Two teen cricket prodigies struggle against their overbearing father and a system stacked against them to realize their own ambitions and identities.

Title: Love Alarm
Synopsis: In a world where an app alerts people if someone in the vicinity likes them, Kim Jojo experiences young love while coping with personal adversities.

Title: Insatiable
Synopsis: A bullied teenager turns to beauty pageants as a way to exact her revenge, with the help of a disgraced coach who soon realizes he's in over his head.

Title: Meteor Garden
Synopsis: Dong Shancai is determined to excel at her dream university, where she encounters an elite clique of dashing, popular high-achievers -- and finds love.

Title: October Faction
Synopsis: The family drama gets downright monstrous as parents Fred and Deloris hunt the supernatural, and twins Viv and Geoff harbor their own strange secrets.

Title: Atypical
Synopsis: When a teen on the autism spectrum decides to get a girlfriend, his bid for more independence puts his whole family on a path of self-discovery.

Title: How to Sell Drugs Online (Fast)
Synopsis: To win back his ex-girlfriend, a nerdy teen starts selling ecstasy online out of his bedroom -- and becomes one of Europe's biggest dealers.

Title: Luna Nera
Synopsis: In 17th-century Italy, a teenager learns about her destiny among a family of witches, just as her boyfriend's father hunts her down for witchcraft.

Title: Daybreak
Synopsis: Living his best life in post-apocalyptic LA, a slacker strives to find the girl of his dreams while outwitting mindless ghouls and cliquish gangs.

Title: The Rain
Synopsis: Six years after a brutal virus wipes out most of Scandinavia's population, two siblings join a band of young survivors seeking safety -- and answers.

Title: Baby
Synopsis: Fed up with their families and classmates, two teen girls from a wealthy part of Rome are drawn to the city's underworld and start leading double lives.

Title: The Society
Synopsis: When everyone else mysteriously vanishes from their wealthy town, the teen residents of West Ham must forge their own society to survive.

Title: The Order
Synopsis: Out to avenge his mother's death, a college student pledges a secret order and lands in a war between werewolves and practitioners of dark magic.

Title: Jinn
Synopsis: A field trip to Petra causes two jinns -- one good, the other evil -- to enter the human realm, turning high school into a supernatural battleground.

Title: Teasing Master Takagi-san
Synopsis: Teased constantly by classmate Takagi-san, middle-schooler Nishikata swears payback by trying (and failing) to give her a dose of her own medicine.

Title: Trinkets
Synopsis: A grieving teen finds an unexpected connection with two classmates at her new high school after they all land in the same Shoplifters Anonymous group.

Title: The Stranded
Synopsis: Trapped on an island destroyed by a tsunami, the students of an elite school try to hold on to hope. But mysterious forces seem to work against them.

Title: Derry Girls
Synopsis: Amidst the political conflict of Northern Ireland in the 1990s, five high school students square off with the universal challenges of being a teenager.

Title: The Prince of Tennis ~ Match! Tennis Juniors ~
Synopsis: A tennis whiz beats the odds to excel on the court while juggling school and inspiring teammates. Based on the hit manga series by Takeshi Konomi.

Title: The Politician
Synopsis: Rich kid Payton has always known he's going to be president. But first he has to navigate the most treacherous political landscape of all: high school.

Title: Good Morning Call
Synopsis: A high school girl finally gets her own apartment, but she has to share it with the most popular boy in school. No one can know they're living together.

Title: Scream
Synopsis: Memories of a town's dark past are stirred when a group of teenagers is targeted by a masked slasher in this serialized anthology series.

Title: On My Block
Synopsis: In a rough inner-city Los Angeles neighborhood, four smart, funny and streetwise teens find their lifelong friendship tested as they begin high school.

Title: Cheer
Synopsis: This gripping docuseries follows the ups and downs of Navarro College's competitive cheer squad as they work to win a coveted national title.

Title: American Vandal
Synopsis: In the wake of their first documentary's success, Peter and Sam seek a new case and settle on a stomach-churning mystery at a Washington high school.

Title: Unrequited Love
Synopsis: A complicated, one-sided secret attraction sends ripples through the lives of a mild-mannered student and her dashing classmate.

Title: The A List
Synopsis: Romance, rivalry and radical mystery collide as a group of teens attend a remote island sleepaway camp in this suspenseful, supernatural drama.
In a future where the elite inhabit an island paradise far from the crowded slums, you get one chance to join the 3% saved from squalor.

Title: Degrassi: Next Class
Synopsis: Degrassi's next generation of high-tech newbies and returning students navigates real-world high school drama. If you're a teen, this is your life.

Title: Always a Witch
Synopsis: A young 17th-century witch time travels to the future to save the man she loves, but first must adjust to present-day Cartagena and defeat a dark rival.

Title: Everything Sucks!
Synopsis: It's 1996 in a town called Boring, where high school misfits in the AV and drama clubs brave the ups and downs of teenage life in the VHS era.

Title: CAROLE & TUESDAY
Synopsis: Part-timer Carole meets rich girl Tuesday, and each realizes they've found the musical partner they need. Together, they just might make it.

Title: Switched
Synopsis: High schooler Ayumi's perfect world evaporates when her envious classmate Zenko somehow steals her body, her boyfriend and her life.

Title: Take My Brother Away
Synopsis: Bickering siblings Shi Miao and Shi Fen tackle friendship matters, school drama and the pitfalls of growing up with little parental supervision.

Title: Superstition
Synopsis: A family with supernatural abilities fights to keep their small Southern town free from sinister spirits and otherworldly possessions.

Title: Beyond Stranger Things
Synopsis: Secrets from the "Stranger Things 2" universe are revealed as cast and guests discuss the latest episodes with host Jim Rash. Caution: spoilers ahead!

Title: Chambers
Synopsis: Haunted by eerie visions and sinister impulses after a heart transplant, a teenager tries to unmask the truth behind her donor's mysterious death.

Title: The Hockey Girls
Synopsis: The passionate members of a girls' roller hockey team chase down victories in the rink while striving to make time for school, family and romance.

Title: Mortel
Synopsis: After making a deal with a supernatural figure, two high schoolers emerge with extraordinary powers and join forces to solve a murder.

Title: Between
Synopsis: After a mysterious disease kills every resident over 21 years old, survivors of a town must fend for themselves when the government quarantines them.

Title: Quicksand
Synopsis: After a tragedy at a school sends shock waves through a wealthy Stockholm suburb, a seemingly well-adjusted teen finds herself on trial for murder.

Title: Kiss Me First
Synopsis: A lonely young woman hooked on a virtual reality game befriends a party girl who leads her into a world of new thrills and dark secrets.

Title: Mob Psycho 100
Synopsis: There's an organization gathering espers for a nefarious purpose. Powerful psychic Mob, however, is just trying to be the protagonist of his own life.

Title: Haters Back Off
Synopsis: Determined to make it big, the confident but clueless Miranda Sings embarks on an unlikely quest for fame in this offbeat comedy.

Title: Sintonia
Synopsis: Three teens living in the same São Paulo favela pursue their dreams while maintaining their friendship, amid a world of music, drugs and religion.

Title: We Are the Wave
Synopsis: A mysterious classmate leads four idealistic teens in a revolt against a rising tide of nationalistic fervor, but their movement takes a dark turn.

Title: The Innocents
Synopsis: Runaway teen lovers June and Harry find themselves swept up in a dangerous and confusing new world when June begins to display mysterious abilities.

Title: Neo Yokio
Synopsis: Joined by his faithful mecha-butler, Kaz Kaan pursues love, fashion and supernatural forces amid Neo Yokio's sinister high society.

Title: Re:Mind
Synopsis: Eleven high school classmates awaken, restrained to a large dining room. While fearing for their lives, they question a motive to this bizarre act.

Title: Chasing Cameron
Synopsis: Go behind the scenes with social media sensation Cameron Dallas as he takes his career to the next level on an international tour.

Title: The Judgement
Synopsis: After a traumatic incident at a party makes her a target of gossip and derision, a young college student tries to change her school's toxic culture.

Title: Blazing Transfer Students
Synopsis: Featuring the boys of Johnny's West, a gang of zany transfer students are recruited for a mysterious mission ordained by their shadowy principal.

Title: On Children
Synopsis: These uncanny tales reveal a world where individuals face the tragic consequences of social pressure, parental oppression and family dysfunction.

Title: MINDHUNTER
Synopsis: In the late 1970s two FBI agents expand criminal science by delving into the psychology of murder and getting uneasily close to all-too-real monsters.

Title: Bodyguard
Synopsis: After helping thwart a terrorist attack, a war veteran is assigned to protect a politician who was a main proponent of the very conflict he fought in.

Title: The Haunting of Hill House
Synopsis: Flashing between past and present, a fractured family confronts haunting memories of their old home and the terrifying events that drove them from it.

Title: The Sinner
Synopsis: When a chilling murder sends shockwaves through a small town, a haunted detective's hunt for answers unravels a web of sinister secrets.

Title: Manhunt
Synopsis: Faced with few clues and an increasingly panicked public, the FBI calls on a new kind of profiler to help track down the infamous Unabomber.

Title: The Gift
Synopsis: A painter in Istanbul embarks on a personal journey as she unearths universal secrets about an Anatolian archaeological site and its link to her past.

Title: The Alienist
Synopsis: In 1896 New York City, psychologist Laszlo Kreizler is enlisted by Police Commissioner Theodore Roosevelt to catch a killer preying on homeless boys.

Title: High Seas
Synopsis: Two sisters discover disturbing family secrets after a string of mysterious deaths occur on a luxury ship traveling from Spain to Brazil in the 1940s.

Title: Perfume
Synopsis: When a singer is found murdered, with her scent glands excised from her body, detectives probe a group of friends who attended boarding school with her.

Title: The Order
Synopsis: Out to avenge his mother's death, a college student pledges a secret order and lands in a war between werewolves and practitioners of dark magic.

Title: The Ghost Bride
Synopsis: In 1890s Malacca, Li Lan finds herself in the afterlife and becomes mired in a mystery linked to the sinister, deceased son of a wealthy family.

Title: The OA
Synopsis: Seven years after vanishing from her home, a young woman returns with mysterious new abilities and recruits five strangers for a secret mission.

Title: Glitch
Synopsis: A police officer and a doctor face an emotionally charged mystery when seven local residents inexplicably return from the dead in peak physical form.

Title: Black
Synopsis: A Grim Reaper, a detective and a woman who foresees death get ensnared in matters of life and death -- and dark mysteries of twenty years past.

Title: Evil Genius: the True Story of America's Most Diabolical Bank Heist
Synopsis: This baffling true crime story starts with the grisly death of a pizza man who robs a bank with a bomb around his neck -- and gets weirder from there.

Title: Scream
Synopsis: Memories of a town's dark past are stirred when a group of teenagers is targeted by a masked slasher in this serialized anthology series.

Title: The Indian Detective
Synopsis: In this crime dramedy, a suspended Canadian cop visits his father in Mumbai and assists in investigating a huge criminal operation with links to home.

Title: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
Synopsis: Eccentric amateur sleuth Dirk and his grudging assistant Todd make their way haphazardly through tangled, dangerous supernatural mysteries.

Title: Black Spot
Synopsis: A police chief and an eccentric new prosecutor investigate a string of grisly crimes and eerie phenomena in an isolated town at the edge of a forest.

Title: The A List
Synopsis: Romance, rivalry and radical mystery collide as a group of teens attend a remote island sleepaway camp in this suspenseful, supernatural drama.

Title: Slasher
Synopsis: Rampaging serial killers leave carnage in their wake as their next victims fight to stay alive in this horror anthology series.

Title: Criminal: UK
Synopsis: Within the walls of an interrogation room and with time running out, London investigators go after three suspects, each accused of a grievous crime.

Title: Somewhere Between
Synopsis: A local news producer is given one chance to relive a deadly week and stop a serial killer. If she fails, she'll lose her daughter forever.

Title: Bloodline
Synopsis: When the black sheep son of a respected family threatens to expose dark secrets from their past, sibling loyalties are put to the test.

Title: The Frankenstein Chronicles
Synopsis: A detective tracks what seems to be a killer with a taste for dismemberment in 1827 London, but the case leads in a far more terrifying direction.
